obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_69_0: * KRIS^1, THERE YOU ARE. THE PATIENTS ARE WAITING FOR YOU./%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_74_0: * YES^1, I KNOW I'M QUITE SMALL FOR A SECRETARY./
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_75_0: * BUT^1, KNOCKOFFS DON'T HAVE THE RIGHT TO COMPLAIN.../%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_81_0: * WELL? HOW DID THE SESSION GO?/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_83_0: * ..^1. WHICH ONE OF YOU WAS THE PATIENT^1, ANYWAY?/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_88_0: * WELL^1, YOU GOT PAID^1, DIDN'T YOU?/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_117_: * (Well^1, there is not a man here.)/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_138_: * (Well^1, he seems to be pointing at something and nodding.)/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_183_: * (They began by sketching what they had seen behind the tree.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_184_: * (But^1, as they sketched^1, the line began to err^1, as if the pencil had lost its way.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_185_: * (So they started again^1, drawing over the lines they had already made.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_186_: * (Many times^1, they would suddenly halt^1, or the pencil drifted into a new drawing...)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_187_: * (So^1, they started over^1, over^1, over again.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_188_: * (Through many repetitions^1, their movements became faster and smoother...)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_189_: * (..^1. until without looking^1, they had completed a sketch in a single^1, wild line.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_191_: * (In the end^1, as a result of layering the sketches on top of each other...)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_192_: * (..^1. The surface of the canvas was nothing more than a monochrome smear.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_194_: * (Next^1, a tree was painted over it...)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_196_: * (..^1. leaving nothing but a simple still life.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_197_: * (..^1. After all^1, there wasn't anything to look at in the room besides a single tree.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_199_: * (Kris got up. It seemed the painting was complete.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_202_: * (..^1. was still moving^1, as if to trace some unseen shape.)/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_210_: * (You admired the texture of the canvas.)/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_227_: * (An Egg was picked up from a nearby easel.)/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_260_: * (Someone seems to be making a painting of a tree.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_261_: * (However^1, strangely^1, it seems that they haven't drawn the bark yet.)/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_282_: * (It would be ridiculous if you painted something and there was nowhere to wash your hands.)/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_288_: * (You ran water over your hands^1, and dried them.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_289_: * (Between your fingers^1, a faint grey crease glittered stubbornly.)/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_290_: * (..^1. You can never wash it all away.)/%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_318_: * Oh...^1! I'm sorry. I was so into drawing I didn't notice you!/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_319_: * Are you here for Art Club?/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_320_: * Right^1, this is where we draw pictures^1, and don't kill each other!/
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_321_: * ..^1. What am I drawing? Oh^1, don't look. I'm not finished yet.../%
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_327_: * How did I get here? Hmm.../
obj_dw_churchb_man_slash_Step_0_gml_329_: * ..^1. I was in such a rush^1, I didn't look where I was going at all!/%
